alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:58PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Rising Water Levels Later This Week and Weekend... Multiple weather fronts will bring several rounds of rain to the upper Koyukuk River Valley and Brooks Range from the Dalton Highway west this week. The most significant rainfall is expected Thursday night through Saturday with 1 to 2 inches of rain likely, with the potential for locally higher amounts in the Brooks Range. Rivers draining the Brooks Range will see rapid rises later this week, including the Koyukuk River. Water levels may reach bankfull in some locations with gravel bars being covered, increased debris in the river, and water up to the brush line. People living or recreating along rivers in this area area encouraged to monitor water levels.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley
